entry.title: $2450 // ****Too Many Amenities to Name*** ***Beautiful Brownstone Block***
entry.content:
One Of a Kind Building in Beautiful Stuyvesant Heights!

Central Air Conditioning
Central Heat
Dishwasher
Exposed Brick
Garage Parking
Hardwood Floors
High Ceilings
Laundry in Building
Media Room/Clubhouse
Microwave
Modern Bathrooms
parking
Part-time Doorman
Roof Deck
Sauna
Stainless Steel Appliances
Voice Intercom

Located right around the corner from the Express Utica A train - 20 mins TOPS to downtown Manhattan! Awesome Bars/Restaurants like NaNa Ramen, Chez Oskar, and Casablanca right aroudn the corner!

For more info, please call/text BEN at show contact info

entry.title: $2295 // Best Deal in Clinton Hill - See this 2 Bedroom Today!!
entry.content:
Newly Renovated 2 Bedroom Apartment in Clinton Hill!

- Queen Sized Rooms
- New Kitchen w/ Stainless Steel Appliances + DISHWASHER
- Laundry in Building
- Windows and Closets in Both bedrooms
- Exposed Brick in Living Room
- NO BROKER'S FEE!!!

Located just around the corner from the Franklin C/S stop, you'll have easy transit to Manhattan and throughout Brooklyn. Right around the corner from neighborhood hot spots like Glorietta Baldy and Joloff.

For more info, please call text BEN at show contact info
